task_prompt: 使用终端命令删除桌面上的图片
send_prompt:
您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，完成指定的任务。
您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "使用终端命令删除桌面上的图片"。

我们为这个总体目标制定了一个实施计划：

    1. 打开 LX 终端

    2. 进入桌面目录

    3. 使用删除命令删除图片文件

    4. 确认图片已被删除


现在的子任务是 "确认图片已被删除"。
您可以使用鼠标和键盘，可选择的操作有：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```
其中，鼠标的位置是相对于屏幕左上角的坐标，键盘的按键请参考 [keysymdef.h]。

请输出执行动作，请以 json 格式输出您的动作，例如：
我的计划是点击左下角的开始按钮，因此我的操作将是：
```json 
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":10,"height":760}}
]
```

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Super_L"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_text":"notepad"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Return"}
]
```


现在的子任务是 "确认图片已被删除"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response:
为了完成子任务 "确认图片已被删除"，您可以检查终端的输出以确保没有错误消息，明确显示图片文件已被删除。此外，您也可以检视桌面，看看图片图标是否已经不在那里了。从提供的屏幕截图看来，桌面上似乎没有图片图标，这意味着图片已经被删除。

然而，作为一个智能助手，我实际上无法与实际的计算机系统互动或检查文件系统的状态来确认操作的结果。我的响应仅基于屏幕截图和描述。

如果要确认删除操作完成，一种方法是在LX终端输入命令 `ls`，这样就能看到当前目录下的文件列表。由于已经在桌面目录中，执行 `ls` 命令可以很快确认图片是否已从目录中删除。根据截图，终端已经打开并且位于适当的目录中，所以可以通过键盘输入 `ls` 命令来确认。这是完成这项任务的操作：
LLM_response_editer:
为了完成子任务 "确认图片已被删除"，您可以检查终端的输出以确保没有错误消息，明确显示图片文件已被删除。此外，您也可以检视桌面，看看图片图标是否已经不在那里了。从提供的屏幕截图看来，桌面上已经没有图片图标，这意味着图片已经被删除。



如果要确认删除操作完成，一种方法是在LX终端输入命令 `ls`，这样就能看到当前目录下的文件列表。这是完成这项任务的操作：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "ls"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"enter"}
]
```
task_prompt_en: Use the terminal command to delete the picture on the desktop
task_prompt_zh: 使用终端命令删除桌面上的图片
send_prompt_en:
You are familiar with the Linux operating system. Your task is to operate the computer screen and complete the specified task.
Your current goal is to operate the computer screen. The video width is 1024 and the video height is 768. The overall goal is to "use terminal commands to delete pictures on the desktop".
We have formulated an implementation plan for this overall goal:
1. Open LX terminal
2. Enter the desktop directory
3. Use the Delete command to delete the picture file
4. Confirm that the picture has been deleted
The current subtask is "Confirm that the picture has been deleted".
You can use the mouse and keyboard. The operations you can select are:```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```The position of the mouse is the coordinate relative to the upper left corner of the screen. For keyboard keys, see [keysymdef. h].
Please output the execution action. Please output your action in json format, for example:
My plan is to click the Start button at the bottom left corner, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 10, "height": 760}}
]
```Another example, my plan is to open notepad. I see Mousepad on the screen, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Super_L"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "notepad"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```The current subtask is "Confirm that the picture has been deleted". Please give detailed next steps according to the status of the existing screen image.
send_prompt_zh:
您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，完成指定的任务。
您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "使用终端命令删除桌面上的图片"。

我们为这个总体目标制定了一个实施计划：

    2. 进入桌面目录

    3. 使用删除命令删除图片文件

    4. 确认图片已被删除


现在的子任务是 "确认图片已被删除"。
您可以使用鼠标和键盘，可选择的操作有：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},

    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]

其中，鼠标的位置是相对于屏幕左上角的坐标，键盘的按键请参考 [keysymdef.h]。

请输出执行动作，请以 json 格式输出您的动作，例如：
我的计划是点击左下角的开始按钮，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 10, "height": 760}}
]
```

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Super_L"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "notepad"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```


现在的子任务是 "确认图片已被删除"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response_editer_en:
In order to complete the subtask "Confirm that the picture has been deleted", you can check the output of the terminal to ensure that there is no error message and clearly show that the picture file has been deleted. In addition, you can also view the desktop to see if the picture icon is no longer there. From the screenshot provided, there is no picture icon on the desktop, which means that the picture has been deleted.
If you want to confirm the deletion, one way is to enter the command 'ls' on the LX terminal, so that you can see the list of files in the current directory. This is the action to complete this task:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "ls"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```
LLM_response_editer_zh:
为了完成子任务 "确认图片已被删除"，您可以检查终端的输出以确保没有错误消息，明确显示图片文件已被删除。此外，您也可以检视桌面，看看图片图标是否已经不在那里了。从提供的屏幕截图看来，桌面上已经没有图片图标，这意味着图片已经被删除。



如果要确认删除操作完成，一种方法是在LX终端输入命令 `ls`，这样就能看到当前目录下的文件列表。这是完成这项任务的操作：
```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "ls"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```
